scenes.description: Fuwawa finishes reading her heartfelt letter to the Ruffians (fans).
Fuwawa hands the floor over to Mococo for her letter.
Mococo reads her emotional letter to the fans, reflecting on their journey and promising to protect their smiles.
FUWAMOCO wrap up their 3D debut together, thanking the audience and sharing a final 'Bau bau'.
A transition sequence showing a B-roll animation of FUWAMOCO's 3D house and their silhouettes in the window.
Closing credit screen with a group photo and a final message from FUWAMOCO.

subtitles.original: Sincerely, your fluffy Fuwawa.
subtitles.english: Sincerely, your fluffy Fuwawa.

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Ah, next, Mococo-chan, your turn.
subtitles.english: Ah, next, Mococo-chan, your turn.

subtitles.original: I guess it's my turn then, huh?
subtitles.english: I guess it's my turn then, huh?

subtitles.original: I'll do my best, huh!
subtitles.english: I'll do my best, huh!

subtitles.original: Ruffians!
subtitles.english: Ruffians!

subtitles.original: I can't believe we're finally here, after so long.
subtitles.english: I can't believe we're finally here, after so long.

subtitles.original: I'm so happy we've been able to spend today together.
subtitles.english: I'm so happy we've been able to spend today together.

subtitles.original: To be honest, there were many hard times...
subtitles.english: To be honest, there were many hard times...

subtitles.original: times when we doubted ourselves and were frustrated with our own limits...
subtitles.english: times when we doubted ourselves and were frustrated with our own limits...

subtitles.original: but because you were here by my side with kind words and lots of headpats...
subtitles.english: but because you were here by my side with kind words and lots of headpats...

subtitles.original: because you accepted me even when I was maybe a bit needy or being silly...
subtitles.english: because you accepted me even when I was maybe a bit needy or being silly...

subtitles.original: because of that, we were able to reach today!
subtitles.english: because of that, we were able to reach today!

subtitles.original: There's still a lot of growing I have to do, but I...
subtitles.english: There's still a lot of growing I have to do, but I...

subtitles.original: hope you can watch me do my best and take even one step forward everyday.
subtitles.english: hope you can watch me do my best and take even one step forward everyday.

subtitles.original: Because you know, one step forward a day is seven steps a week!
subtitles.english: Because you know, one step forward a day is seven steps a week!

subtitles.original: And eventually, that will amount to something amazing.
subtitles.english: And eventually, that will amount to something amazing.

subtitles.original: And of course, I will always be waiting here for you, ready to protect your smile!
subtitles.english: And of course, I will always be waiting here for you, ready to protect your smile!

subtitles.original: Nothing will ever break the pledge we made to you.
subtitles.english: Nothing will ever break the pledge we made to you.

subtitles.original: So get ready, because your smile is going to be protected, whether you like it or not!
subtitles.english: So get ready, because your smile is going to be protected, whether you like it or not!

subtitles.original: Got it?
subtitles.english: Got it?

subtitles.original: Sincerely, your fuzzy Mococo.
subtitles.english: Sincerely, your fuzzy Mococo.

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Today, another huge dream of ours has come true.
subtitles.english: Today, another huge dream of ours has come true.

subtitles.original: Today, another huge dream of ours has come true.
subtitles.english: Today, another huge dream of ours has come true.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much, always.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, always.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much, always.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, always.

subtitles.original: Please let us continue to protect your smile for-ever and ever, okay?
subtitles.english: Please let us continue to protect your smile for-ever and ever, okay?

subtitles.original: Please let us continue to protect your smile for-ever and ever, okay?
subtitles.english: Please let us continue to protect your smile for-ever and ever, okay?

subtitles.original: For-ever and ever!
subtitles.english: For-ever and ever!

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.english: We look forward to your continued support!

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Dearest Ruffians,
subtitles.english: Dearest Ruffians,

subtitles.original: Thank you for always being by our sides!!
subtitles.english: Thank you for always being by our sides!!

subtitles.original: We had so much fun wrestling, singing and dancing for you in 3D!
subtitles.english: We had so much fun wrestling, singing and dancing for you in 3D!

subtitles.original: We're going to protect your smile furr-ever & ever!
subtitles.english: We're going to protect your smile furr-ever & ever!

subtitles.original: FUWAMOCO
